MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Routing.RequestContext GetRequestContext(class System.Web.HttpContext httpContext) cil managed

Docs.param: The context information that is associated with the Web request.
Docs.summary: Returns the instance for the current Web request.
Docs.returns: The request context for the Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A new context is created if it is required. This can occur if the current request is not a Dynamic Data request.
